meanings.definition: The act of constructing or decorating a ceiling with sunken panels.
meanings.sent1: The coffering of the ceiling added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The coffering in the grand hall was meticulously crafted by skilled artisans.
meanings.sent3: The coffering on the ceiling made it look like a beautiful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The coffering created a sense of depth and sophistication in the room.
meanings.sent5: The intricate coffering on the ceiling captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A series of sunken panels in a ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The coffering in the library ceiling was a unique architectural feature.
meanings.sent2: The coffering of the auditorium ceiling was designed to enhance acoustics.
meanings.sent3: The coffering on the ceiling resembled a pattern of hidden treasure chests.
meanings.sent4: The coffering created a mesmerizing play of light and shadow in the room.
meanings.sent5: The coffering on the ceiling gave the room a sense of grandeur and depth.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a coffered ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The coffering of the ballroom required skilled craftsmen to complete.
meanings.sent2: The coffering process involved careful measurement and precise execution.
meanings.sent3: The coffering project turned the plain ceiling into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The coffering process transformed the room into a luxurious space.
meanings.sent5: The coffering work was a labor of love that resulted in a stunning ceiling design.
